text:
Doctrine | https://doctrine.fr | Paris, FR | ONSITE | Full Time | Front, Back, Data Scientist

Doctrine is the "Google" for the case-law in France! We are disrupting the legal market at a very VERY high pace.

We went from 5 to 30 persons in 2017. A steady growth that will continue in 2018, from 30 to 90. We are hiring 60 new smart, wicked and hard working folks.

We are looking for young & smart french-speaking Data Scientists that have experience in NLP / Deep Learning to automate lawyers' repetitive & boring jobs!

Apply here: https://www.doctrine.fr/recrutement or see our open positions on Angel List: https://angel.co/doctrine-/jobs
